about_the_game:
Keeper's Toll: Original Soundtrack
Immerse yourself in the dark, pulse-pounding world of Keeper's Toll with this original soundtrack by Brightbone. Featuring an edgy blend of four-on-the-floor rhythms, haunting dark fantasy soundscapes, and lush, synth-driven melodies, this album captures the relentless energy and mystique of the game. Whether you're battling hordes or basking in the eerie calm of a cursed world, Brightbone's masterful compositions will keep your heart racing and your imagination soaring.

Features:

  • All music included in the game

  • 2 bonus tracks that didn't make it into the game
